/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by modern buildings, their facades adorned with glass windows that reflect the clear blue sky. Cars of various colors are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation system. Trees line the street, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly in the blue sky, casting a warm glow on the scene.
